- in ClassFileEditor (no PSDocument)
- the SWT error is also (indirectly) caused by a position before or after the
document's range
Could be caused by an attached source that does not match with the class file.

Mmh. Doubt so: the editor's source comes from JCore via IClassFile and I'd
assume that JCore does the same when building the AST for the IClassFile and
hence both would have the same wrong file.

Correct, verified by building a jar and attaching source that does not match the
line numbers. (verfied in debugger that they do not match)
*** Bug 89535 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
